name: imgix
headline: The platform for your visual media.
description:
Nobody should have to employ expensive imaging scientists and engineers for their business to get the most out of their visual media. This is where imgix has your back. imgix is a platform for managing, processing, rendering, optimizing, and delivering your existing visual assets so that you can meet the demands of your business and your team can stay focused on what they do best.

The business demands on web visual media can blindside even the most hyper-aware content teams and developers. Just to be competitive on the Internet, you need your images to be sized perfectly to every device, served in one of any of a half dozen web formats, optimized to the absolute best perceptual quality while maintaining pinpoint performance, and distributed to wherever your users are, anywhere in the world. And that is just the baseline. Next-level imaging concerns like copyright, licensing, accessibility, moderation, illegal or explicit content, "fake news", and more, can threaten your business at any moment if not handled properly. Get any of these things wrong and you are shedding revenue, ceding ground to competitors, and potentially exposing your business to extreme liability.

By working with imgix's powerful APIs, SDKs, user interfaces, and integrations, you can rest assured that any demands on your images and videos will always be met, now and into the future, without you having to invest in building it yourself or patching together a mishmash of open source and third-party technologies. Our platform is designed to ensure that your images are always working for your business and never against it.

imgix was launched through the famed Y Combinator accelerator program. Its customers include Google, Lyft, Kickstarter, AirBnb, Coursera, Bonobos, Spotify, Vimeo, Bustle, and many others.

founders.name: Chris Zacharias, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder of imgix. Ex-YouTuber. YC S2011 alumni. RIT New Media. Former web developer. Hockey player, defense.

Founded in 2011 and hailing from the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S11, imgix has carved a niche as the premier platform for managing visual media. Located in San Francisco with a talented team of 65, the mission is straightforward and impactful: **“The platform for your visual media.”** 

### What Does imgix Do?

At its core, imgix aims to democratize the complex world of image processing. They believe that no business should need to hire imaging scientists or invest heavily in technology to take full advantage of their visual assets. imgix offers robust APIs, SDKs, and integrations that make it easy for teams to manage, optimize, and deliver images efficiently. This means you can focus on what you do best while ensuring your images are perfectly rendered for any device, format, and location.

### Why imgix Is Essential

The demands on web visual media can be overwhelming. To thrive online, businesses must ensure their images load quickly, display with optimal quality, and conform to copyright and accessibility standards. Mistakes in any of these areas can lead to lost revenue and significant liability. imgix simplifies all of this, offering tools that address everything from basic resizing to comprehensive copyright management and content moderation.

### A Trusted Partner

imgix has built a noteworthy client list that includes major players like Google, Lyft, Airbnb, Spotify, and more. This is a clear indication of the trust and value they bring to high-traffic environments where performance and quality are non-negotiable. With imgix, clients serve over **8 billion images daily**, benefiting from faster load times, better SEO, and elevated user engagement.

### Services and Solutions

Whether you’re a marketer looking to enhance website performance or a developer in need of seamless integration, imgix has tailored solutions ready to fit your needs:
- **Faster Webpages:** Solutions that boost SEO and conversions.
- **Unleashed Creativity:** Tools that allow for captivating image designs without heavy reshooting.
- **Simplified Development:** Features that automate bulk image transformations.

With case studies showcasing successes from the likes of Coursera and Bonobos, and the ability to integrate with popular stacks effortlessly, imgix is positioned not just as a service provider but as a critical component in digital strategy.

### Conclusion

In a world where visual media can make or break user experience, imgix stands out as a pivotal resource. By leveraging their platform, businesses can stay ahead of digital demands while freeing up valuable time and resources. So if your visual media needs an upgrade, imgix might just be the partner you're looking for.

For more details, explore their offerings directly at [imgix.com](https://www.imgix.com).
